Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: We had a great time. Delicious food and plenty of it, friendly staff and also some nice drinks. Favourite dish wash the sweet custard bun

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Good food and service. Despite being busy (they was no empty table left) food got quickly to our table. When found out we'd arrive a few minutes late we called and they kept our table for us. Also very good eye for customer, offering to ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Never disappoints ü•∞
My go-to Korean bbq in Amsterdam

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The food was really good and the service was fast and the were all very kind. Definitely wod recommend if you love lots of delicious dishes and can't wait to try out some Korean food.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: One of my favorite places to celebrate something! Always make a reservation even if it‚Äôs for the same day, because it gets packed very quickly. They accommodate you bringing in cakes, etc. So it‚Äôs great for events. No, it‚Äôs not super ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
The food is decent, nothing's special. There is lack of house sauces. This is not authentic Korean BBQ, there are also some Chinese and Japanese food.
The attitude of one of the waitress was unacceptable. I visited on Friday August ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Do not get the sushi.
But get the Korean dishes. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Guys trust me, eating at Ms Korea last night was really enjoyable, fun, most importantly the food was really delicious...oh by the way the service was just fantastic. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Service was nice. Food okay. Could be better. In general a good place.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Delicious food, maybe a little bit expensive but good experience.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great food! Great staff :) Drinks are a lil too overpriced though.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: My lady and I were looking forward to this meal because she had a very good experience with this place BEFORE. She was very excited to show me this place as we both were very hungry. It was very disappointing because the meat was not fresh, ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: It was very good. Highly recommended the place for anyone craving for a good samgyupsal. Staff are great and food was good. Price is also reasonable, its unlimited order of different food in the menu for 2 hours. And they will serve the dessert after your done eating. Drinks are charged additional but they also have a lot of choices.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Amazing place with great food and service. It was my first time in a Korean BBQ and they helped me with everything I needed and explained everything very well.
The food was fantastic with so many different tastes.
A very nice experience overall.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: I went to the place today with my sister. The staff is very friendly and attentive. They come by often and saw when the bbq-paper must be replaced. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: A four star rating is awarded to this establishment. A reservation is required however, we were lucky enough to wait 15 minutes for a table of party who never showed up. Upon being seated you are bombarded with the restaurants policies, ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Portions were adequate and the concept was lovely. However, too crowded in such a small space, the waiter dropped the plates two times on the table (was not nice), was too noisy (I couldn't hear my friend), briefly it was so hectic that we wanted to have dinner asap and go out. On the other hand, I enjoyed the food.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Fresh food, just make sure you're up for the grilling part if you order raw meat. You might smell from meat when you leave the place, although they do their best to ventilate. When it gets busy, make sure that you got all your requested ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Decent quality food. Nice, slightly crowded but cozy atmosphere. It‚Äôs a great korean bbq experience in a popular part of Ams.
If you include drinks it becomes pricey but I think it worth the atmosphere. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: while the service was quick and everything was really easy to order, the barbecue meats were incredibly weak. the meats were quite tough and very bland. those that were meant to be marinated or at least seasoned lacked any kind of flavour ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Best korean BBQ we ever had. Definitely worth the price for all you can eat!
Very friendly service in an accomodating atmosphere.
They even sang happy birthday for my gf ‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great Korean bbq. Very friendly staff and nice selection of dishes! Decent size portions. You'll definitely leave with a full belly and satisfied. The only down side is that you'll be smelling like bbq for the rest of the evening.. I guess it adds to the memory of the great food üòâ

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great price and reasonably close to city centre. Haven't had much experience with Korean barbecue, so can't vouch for how authentic it is but the rounds are generous and most of the food is delicious. Thankfully, that includes the meat that ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Amazing food, lovely service and fair in price. I've loved every visit!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The service was fast, friendly and efficient. The food was delicious and there were more than enough vegan and vegetarian options. Ordering goes via a tablet. Enjoyed the evening.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: As I'm not a big fan of sushi, I can't judge for that part. But what I have eaten, was delicious. They have a lot of choices with the bbq, decent choice in appetizers, stews and side dishes. Only the dessert is really lacking in choice. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Some of the food on the menu is not provided at the store. Meat are not so fresh, and looks different from the picture. Ordering drink is compisary and a glass of water COST FOUR EURO. After one and a half hours they'll shut your grill and expect you leave. Sad, was really looking forward for this. But sad.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The only kbbq buffet if you are stuck in amsterdam. Bbq is done via electric hot plate. The food seems to cater to Dutch taste. E.g. The miso paste is altered to a "brown BBQ sauce", ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Nog very much space when you‚Äôre sitting down, but my friends and I had a great time here :)

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Amazing service, I love that they are energetic despite its very busy, but, the quality of foods weren‚Äôt good given the price. The overall sanitary condition needs to be improved seriously.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
What a rude waitress they have!!
She served us wrong ice creams and I told her but she threw the bowl to our table. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Good quality food, a bit expensive even though it is all you can eat, but you get good value for your money and would say it is definitely one of the best in its class in Amsterdam

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Korea bbq was amazing. All you can eat. Food cooked well. Affordable and the staff were amazing

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Variety of choices in meat, vegetables, sushi, stir fry, stew, side dishes and drinks. Value for money. Staffs are all friendly, attentive and generous.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Excellent choice if you want to try the famous Korean bbq. Unique tastes, some familiar ones, some entirely new! Really glad we chose this place for our special occasion. Make sure you go with someone who can finish his/her food as ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Overall good experience. The food was good (the ginbap was outstanding) and the staff extremely polite. However, the venue itself was dark and crowded and the grills gave off smoke that made me tear up. The price is normal for an all you can eat Koren BBQ, which are usually pricy.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Good ambiance, wonderfull food and super kind and fast personel. I was here with two other friends for my birthday. We had a wonderfull evening at the restaurant.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Very nice place. The staff were attentive. I love their kimchi and stew.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The concept is fun. The food quality is not top, but ok. BBQ you use on the tables is really poorly made, they make you use some kind of paper to prepare the food on, which is often sticky and can never be the same as the standard BBQ or hot stone.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Efficient service and friendly staff, especially Matthew, he is very attentive.

Good selection of food and ice cream

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Really friendly staff, super delicious food!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: While busy they managed to keep everything seperated enough to make it a comfy experience. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The food is ok, service is fast, I think it‚Äôs a bit over priced, but nothing to complain here because I read their menu online. However, it is not the reason I‚Äôm giving two stars here. The restaurant clearly does not respect the 1.5 meters‚Äô ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Very nice service. The food was ok, but a few dishes could be corrected. We had ,All you can eat' option so tried a lot of dishes.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: I'm a huge fan of Korean BBQ since I tried it the first time in Seoul. . This restaurant is amazing. The staff is extremely kind and helpful.  The food is YummmmY .. and they always come and ask if you need anything.  The price we paid for ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Amazing place, very unique experience. Would definitely recommend.
In the heart of Albert Cuypmaarkt.
Amazing staff, amazing food

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Good foods, need a reservation 'cause it's very full. Be aware of the smell on your clothes after the diner.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Very delicious food and interesting experience. Maximum 3 items per round per person (5 rounds total), for the price, the amount of food is good.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: It's okay, not great, not too bad, like very other sushi annex grill all-you-can-eat thingy out there. Friendly service though. Unfortunately the same tendency as well other similar places to serve almost every grilled or fried fish with sugary sauces. Sushi is okay. Not great, not too bad.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: All you can eat Korean barbecue! A lot of hot food options! (We deducted a star because each drink costs ‚Ç¨2.8 or above, while having drinks are essential for bbq)

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great food, the meat was wonderful. Very unique experience. There was a good amount of tasty side dishes, including famous Korean kimchi! Surprisingly, very tasty. The portions are large and filling, the variety is pretty good, although I ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: No matter where I go I always seem to crave KBBQ so I decided to give Miss Korea BBQ a shot. I came here after a day at the zoo with my husband and what they had to offer and they satisfied our cravings. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: I love this place! It is such a fun experience to do, the food is delicious and the staff is incredibly attentive and sweet! They are definitely a reason to come back, especially in Amsterdam where proper service is often hard to find. I can highly recommend this wonderful restaurant!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
First: No tab water !....

Food is average, it's good place for chilling with friends and cook your own food. All you can eat BBQ menu is little overpriced for the quality.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Pretty good, makes for a fun evening if you take some fun people with you. The food's pretty good and the service is great. For the price per person and the fun of grilling your own food I'd definitely recommend checking them out :)

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The staff was really friendly, fast and helpful. The food was good, especially the bibimbap! Note: It gets hot inside when everyone's barbecuing.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Really cool concept in which you can order your choice of meat and prepare it on the bbq yourself! The already prepared dishes were good as well.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Really nice place with great options and all you can eat, which you can't :)

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: A bit overcrowded.. bbq feature doesn't really work that well and the menu is much shorter than other all you can eat restaurants. I don't think I'll be coming back.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great service! We where able to enter last minute. You order on a tablet and the food comes very quickly. A bit pricey tho 30 pp.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The meats were pretty good, the service, not that much and they had sushi that was very dry. At night you only have all you can eat and in the and you will pay around 32 euros. Nice to try, but i'm not going back.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The amazing korean BBQ in Amsterdam, pleasant marinade for meat and atypical serving a dishes <3

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
The best Korean Barbeque in Amsterdam!

My recommendation is the Bulgogi seasoned Beef and the Sirloin beef try it and you will love it ;-)

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Nice place to catch up with friends while preparing your BBQ meat/seafood /veggies. And while waiting for your BBQ food, just order some Korean dishes and enjoy. My favorites to put on the BBQ are lamb, squid and bulgogi seasoned pork and my favorite dishes are Seafood pancake, Chapchae, Sweet Chicken Wings.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Best Service. Clicked on the dish and it was thereüòç
Very delicious Food. Good Quality!
Will be here again

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Positives first: nice and helpful service. Cool concept and setup, nice interior and location.
Now negatives: food is really mediocre and therefore overpriced. Meat was low ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Awesome place for a good dinner, funny and friendly staff, and lots of meat

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Really enjoyed my visit, lots of food and not too expensive. Service was great and quick too.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The best korean bbq in amsterdam in my opinion. Meat are well marinated. Friendly staff and I always leave this restaurant full and satisfied.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Been coming to this restaurant for about 10 years now and can say it consistently has good food and service.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Food is bland, westernized and mediocre. In addition, the staff will urge you to leave the restaurant 30 minutes before closing time because, and I quote, "we want to go home." After these and more odious comment, so did I. The only thing ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: It was amazing we loved it ! We were there for lunch and everything was so nice, especially the people and the service. Thanks a lot.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Man, what an experience this was. Never tried Korean BBQ before, so this was an extremely pleasant surprise! To keep it short - the food was amazing and of excellent quality, and the staff were not only fast but also very attentive. They ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great place with very tasty dishes. Reasonably priced. Will visit again.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
It was a lovely experience! the service wasn‚Äôt extremely fast but the food was very good.
The only thing that bothered me was that there were two guys next to us and they were loud eaters!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Fast and friendly service. Big range of food to try. Would definitely recommend, also for the different experience of Korean BBQ

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Best Korean in ages, since "little Korea" in Annandale, Virginia and in Korea.
People, wrap the bulgogi meat in the lettuce leaf along with the flavorful side dishes! You're missing the full experience if you just eat it plain and the lettuce sits in the basket like an ornament.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Perfect place to try all Korean cuisine. Professional people. Would recommend to others. Would go again.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Amazing experience. You get to cook your food. The quality of the food was amazing, prepare to eat a lot and have a wide variety of choices.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The meat was old. After baking you could see a rainbow on your meat. The cold noodle soup was disgusting. It tasted like pineapple juice from a can with some tasteless noodle inside. Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: this restaurant isnt even close to being called a korean cuisine...

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Went here today because I was craving some fat juicy meat and it was a very good choice.
Employees were very nice and helping. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: I think that it is an interesting Corean restaurant. So close to the pubs in the Pijp. All you can eat.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Perfect. But be aware that you will smell like BBQ the rest of the day. But worth it.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great. All inclusive mix if meat and veg BBQ

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Disappointing example of Korean food. The waitress (stressed, unfriendly), and Korean dish substitutes (cheapest alternatives which Dutch ppl will not notice) combines to this experience.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Awesome buffet. The food is so good! Make sure to order the custard buns. They have many options for vegetarians.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great experience, staff was impeccable and the food extremely well prepared and served. Would love to comeback for a 2nd time!!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Very good food. Nice staff. You really need to reserve a table.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: I spent 72‚Ç¨ so that you reading this doesn‚Äôt need to. Don‚Äôt eat here, it‚Äôs awful.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Their food and service was absolutely fantastic! I finally met the best naengmeyon in Europe.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: If you crave for some BBQ, this is a great location!! Very friendly staff and the food is delicious üòá

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Get a reservation, this place is busy! Each person gets 3 orders, over 5 rounds (it's more than you think). Drinks are mandatory. The grill is a little small, but forces you to pace yourself. I appreciated proper ventilation so that you don't smell like BBQ afterwards. The pork belly and fried chicken were fabulous!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Good food which tastes a lot better than other KBBQ restaurants i've been to. Staff is nice and helps keeping your BBQ clean! The food you order comes to the table fast. The restaurant looks really nice and has a cozy Korean aesthetic! Would come here more often for sure

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Nice food, fast service, and friendly staff. Great experience overall!

Something to maybe consider, as fun as it is to grill your own food, your ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Very reasonable Korean BBQ in the Heart of Amsterdam. The restaurant is quite spacious and new, even if the tables are a little small. Food is good and the prices are aligned with other all you can eat in this city. People are quite friendly. Overall a good experience!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Reservation was fine and we get our table on time.
But the quality wasn't  as expected for 30 ‚Ç¨ ...
Meat was not seasoned. Sushi was okay. The standard dishes are very small. I ate several times Korean bbq but this was not good...

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
You get plenty of fresh meat and fish. Unlimited rounds that you can order.

Very kind and cheerful staff too. Outstanding food! Totally worth the price, which is very average for this amount of freshness you get served.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Lovely food, fast serving. You can order 3 items per round with 5 rounds max for around ‚Ç¨30 a person.
There‚Äôs a mix of ready made dishes and raw cuts to cook on the grill yourself. Meat was well marinated and everything tasted good.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The best all you can eat in Amsterdam. Really love the pork belly and seaweed salad.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: My first experience of a DIY Korean bbq, but it was really tasty food, helpful staff, and delicious ice-cream too! Try not to over-order as you will be charged for what you don't eat, and they view it as rude, which is fair! I wouldn't ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great service and food! We reserved a table here and wasn't sure what to expect, we arrived, sat down and ordered and food was there very quickly even though it was relatively busy. Will be visiting here again for sure, it's great for ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great and fun experience. Most of the food tastes really good. As long as as you cook it right of course. The cooked food was good and you will feel full when you leave. Had no real issues with smelly clothes after like I have seen complaints about. Maybe they have upgraded their ventilation.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Pretty decent place for an all you can eat restaurant. It's not proper Korean food but you can't really expect that for the price and concept. The BBQ meat was ok, not greatly marinated like we had hoped. The staff were also friendly but ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The food was OK, some bits better than others (we enjoyed the pancake, the soup and a potato, seafood and veggies dish with a bitter sweet and sour sauce). The rest was OK but nothing to have your mind blown, so I would give three stars to ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: You can have authentic korean bbq here if you are looking for korean cuisine. The meats and seafood very fresh.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Services were great but the quality of foods are average in terms of marinaded meats and kimchi is a bit bland. This is a good place to go for when I have cravings for Korean bbq. You‚Äôre able to order 3 dishes each person per round for 5 ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
I'm a local and went here with a friend on Friday night. The food was what you would expect for the price, and we ordered one of their better bottles of wine.
So far so good. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Very good food, the place system is clever.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: This was one of the best restaurant experiences i‚Äôve had in Amsterdam. The food was really good, the sushi was decent, there was so much variety. Atmosphere and staff were really nice. Value for money is great, I had a really good evening. I will definitely be returning!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great all you can eat Korean restaurant in Amsterdam run by Chinese owners. A great selection if dishes and meat as well ad Sushi. A place to go with friends and families and convenient wat if ordering food with a tablet. Friendly staff and quick service with a reasonable price tag.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Pretty bad quality meat tbh, wouldnt recommend

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Reasonable fixed price for a good selection of basic Korean dishes and BBQ ingredients. Small portions tho, so can easily order multiple rounds. Seafood pancake was great!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
The food quality was pretty bad... not worth the money

Won‚Äôt consider coming back

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Nice interoirs and super fast service. Taste of the food ranges from acceptable to good, so it's really more about the communal atmosphere of all-you-can-eat grilling. The noodle (cold noodle) and stew (kimchi) dishes were pretty ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: All u can eat.  So good. Best KBbQ in netherland.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: AMAZING FOOD!!!! AND PRETTY MUCH UNLIMITED TOO!!! It cost around $60 USD for two people and up to 50 dishes (sides/main/dessert in 5 rounds). This was one of the best places we ate in Amsterdam and the service was quick.  We will definitely be returning.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: very nice Korean BBQ experience! they have a variety of meats, poultry, fish and sea food, as well as some veggies that you can grill (I ordered some Portobello mushrooms). Lettuce leaves keep coming non stop even though the place was full ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Food was alright. Not really well-seasoned or marinated except for the duck and lamb (which weren't Korean üòÇüòÇ). Other dishes were alright. Nothing really stood out. Plus the place needs to take better care of their hygiene. Our table was ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Cozy restaurant with a grill build into each table. You order different kinds of food off the menu and grill it yourself. The grill is cleaned properly and the food is tasty (but I had a great chef of course). The sauces and extras are typical Korean. The staff is very kind and helpful. Great place for a first date!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Lots of very tasty food. more than 60 menu items. in total you choose 15 (5 rounds of 3). the duck, the lamb chops and the lamb skewer are amazing. Very good vibe in the restaurant. you cook some of your own food. oh the sushi is also revommended. come hungry and for a long time to really enjoy the place.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great food with a unique concept.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: This restaurant is pretty cute. It has a nice ambience, good lighting, great service. The way the restaurant is set up you prepare your own food on a grill set in the middle of the table. You order small dishes in multiple courses, with ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Expensive but worth the experience. Go with friends, and cook yourself some awesome korean bbq. Meat ranges from beef to chicken as well a big variety of fish. The only grub is cleaning the grill after using it, but the waiters are quick (if its not busy) to help you.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Good value and offers a wide selection of Korean (and non-Korean) dishes. However, with it being an all-you-can-eat establishment, expect for the food quality to only be decent. In sum, Miss Korea is a great place to go to if you're hungry, but unimpressive if you want good Korean food.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Service was very nice. (might be because they also remembered us from earlier visits) food was great to my tastes. Enjoyed it every time. And the self bbqing always kinda gives a good atmosphere in the group.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Food was really good! The only critisism I could give that the table is maybe a bit small for 4 large people.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: I've been here few time and would recommend to go with friends/ in group. The times I've been there it's an all you can eat setting so, no a la carte. All the dishes we got were tasty!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: It's ok to eat a lot, food acceptable but when you are out you smell like a barbecue.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Nice table BBQ korean style fish ,meat and veggies...

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Friendly staff, food arrived fast every time and we never had to ask for drinks as they were offered to us as soon as our glasses were empty.
Food is, for its price, very good. Paying ‚Ç¨1 or ‚Ç¨2 extra for some things is ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The fastest service ever seen in Amsterdam!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Really nice concept, fast service and generally good food. There is abig variety of dishes, some of them is "ready to eat" dishes and some "raw" dishes you grill yourself on the grill at the center of the table. Vegeterian dishes are also ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Food is really delicious and the service is usually super fast.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Food is amazing. Service is very fast. Waiters are very quick in taking orders. Ambience is good.
Only downside is the place is quite cramped and tables too close, but overall ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great food! Loved it!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: I was in Amsterdam for a hen do. It was so good and such good value for money we came here twice over the course of a weekend. Definitely a carnivore's dream and still have fond memories and cravings for this. The buffet selection is really ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: I expected less cause i have been to many korean restaurants but there is always something missing from the food. But for Miss Korea? It way beyond my expectation. We didnt have reservation yet the server still give us place to sit while it ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: You can try Korean-style BBQ in an all-you-can-eat setting. They also serve other miscellaneous Korean dishes, such as sundubu(soft-tofu stew), which are of decent quality. But, yes, it's quite pricey. And the ventilation is almost non-existent, so you'll smell like another fresh-grilled meat when you step out of the door.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Plates are served quickly // dumplings are nice unfortunately the meat is tasteless and extremely fatty (I understand the fat brings flavor but the portions served shower barely no meat on the bones).

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great food, but felt hurried as they kept coming and told us the kitchen would close and that we needed to order more quickly. The staff were not attentive other than telling us to hurry. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The best service I have received in Amsterdam in this 2 years. Staffs are super friendly and food are delicious! ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Delicious Korean BBQ as always!!! Completely worth its money! 6ppl -
We strategically ordered food so that we could last the 5 rounds, and we sure did!!! Super satisfying, we even ordered a bunch of drinks, rice wine, Soju and ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Delicious Korean food. Barbecue at the table. Friendly staff. Reasonable price with all food you can eat. Nice atmosphere. The restaurant is full, so you should reserve in advance.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great food, especially the beef stew. A bit slow for service but then the resta was completely full.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Very reasonable price for a all you can eat barbecue. The food selections are pretty good, quality is also decent. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great for dining as a large group as it is fun to cook the food yourselves. Be warned your clothes will smell of Korean bbq once you leave so don't go after work in your best suit. There is no extractor over the tables and the food is OK hence the 3 stars.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great authentic Korean BBQ experience. After tasting Korean food in Asia, i can attest to the fact that it taste just as the Koreans would cook and eat it. Nice ambiance, though be prepared that after the evening at the restaraunt you whole outfit and hair will smell grill meat. Reasonably priced for the amount of food you get.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Delicious and fun restaurant with great service and a good price for all you can eat Korean bbq! Five rounds of three dishes per person are offered but we didn't make it past round two and were more than satisfied. Definitely recommended :)

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: its ok.. i personally dont like the concept of ‚Äûall you can eat‚Äú and of course you can not accept best quality meat for that price. but all in all, it was ok... service is good, good choice of korean food, good ‚Äûspicy-level‚Äú. you can definitly go here, and if you like to eat a lot, its perfect for you

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great food, nice setting. The place used to be a chinese restaurant but they changed the theme to Korean BBQ which is totally different. The meat is good quality and the sause is tasty. Also the aspect of grilling your own meat is nice.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Good food, unlimited time. Try the chum churum!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Quality food, a bit above average pricing.
Menu is long, but ok - choice is somewhat limited compared to similar restaurants. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Not recommending this place unless you need an Asian food fix. The food doesn‚Äôt taste great and defo no where near authentic Korean food. The only dish i would recommend is the beef+vege stew. Even their kimchi tastes weird, like an express ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Not good at all. The soup tasted like straight up Soja sauce and everything else wasn‚Äôt to my liking either

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: I ate until it hurt, and it was worth it. Great food, don't mess it up by cooking it wrong. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: All you can eat Korean BBQ is always a good idea. I recommend to go mainly for the BBQ as it is good quality meat. The rest is not that interesting. Especially the sushi is boring. Expect to smell of fried food afterwards as the ventilation ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: This is an all you can eat Korean Barbecue place where you get a set number of rounds of food that you can order. For 2 people, it was 6 rounds of 6 items each. The food is really really good. I highly recommend the Pork/Beef/Chicken ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: I could not ask for more !!! Fresh and tasty food all you can eat!!! Nice location near DE PIJP, good price and very nice and professional staff. The only thing is that my clothes were smelling for two days after i even wash thrm,but this is normal. It s not a restaurant fault... i will go again very soon

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: A great place, once a year and preferably with a group of friends. Miss Korea is a true (Korean) BBQ place, meaning that you grill your food in front of you in an enclosed room... Yeap, that's also the main issue - you will SMELL! As a tip ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Too less staff to run entire restaurant. Difficult to get attention for ordering.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The quality of the food is really poor, the staff is not particularly friendly and when you will go out from this place your clothes will badly smell barbecue. I honestly I wanted to give 2 stars instead of 1 but when I asked to have some ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great delicious dish. Too bad no special korean cold tea! And the worst is that the room is very smelly especially when all ppl cook on their own. Should really change the system in the restaurant. Finding parking place is difficult around the area.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Very delicious combination, one of the best all you can eat do it yourself Asian rest

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The food was delicious and came out super quick! My friend and I liked it so much we went back the next day haha. As an added bonus, the staff were very friendly!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: imho cheap meat quality, no air conditioner (really hot in summer), kind of expensive, nothing compared with a real korean bbq, good if you have no comparison point.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The food was good, service and atmosphere were also nice. That's about all I have to say. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great food and fast and friendly service

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Staff is very welcoming. Food is good and served quickly. The ice cream at the end is a very nice way to finish the night!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Cooking your own food on BBQ. Service not particularly attentive. Often get tables mixed up. Not so much a problem, as it's all you can eat. If something doesn't just re-order. Good for groups

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: worst food ever. I feel bad for someone that's trying out korean food for the first time in this kind of restaurant.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Fantastic staff and incredible food. Our dining experience was excellent thanks to the cozy atmosphere and very friendly staff!
Highly Recommend!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Quick service, nice staff and good food. A bit to growded and hot.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Food tastes so-so. Didn't get all ordered food

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great place to enjoy korean bbq. The staff is very nice and helpful and theres a great variety between barbeque dishes and other things like sushi, noodles or rice dishes! If u want to enjoy some great kbbq in amsterdam go to this place. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Tasty good. Little portions but lots of rounds then you can eat lots of different things. Be aware your clothing will stink if you cook in the barbecue. But it deserve it!!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Even with tempered expectations, this place fell far below it. The reasons you go to korean bbq (all you can eat, or not), is for 1) the meats, 2) the banchan sides, and 3) the flavors. This place fell flat on all three counts, seriously. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Chinases based Korean food. Only ice cream was good. Pork belly structure was strange.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Star for the all you can eat and at a cheap price. However, if you think this is how Korean BBQ should be done, you're mistaken. Had the worst time with the slow service, poor ventilation, greasy floor, and the worst part was the meat ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: All you can eat restaurant. (3 dishes per round, 5 rounds) Kind staff, food ranges from okay to good (better than bland all you can eat sushi), clean environment. Authentic Korean dishes, but misses the authentic korean flavor. They used to ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Its not really what you are looking for when you want authentic Korean food. If you have been to Korea before, you will notice that every dish is a off. That isn't really a problem if it taste good imo. They spend little attention to detail ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
The positives: there is food here.
The negatives: the food is quite tasteless and unauthentic, there is almost no ventilation so you will smell like hell afterwards, and if you order a bottle of ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Good service, large variety of things to put on the BBQ - beware, you will be boiling hot. Best to do when it is cold outside or you are in need of a sauna. Tasty food, a real treat.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Nice place and kind staff but can be extremely busy so if they don‚Äôt chat you then it isn‚Äôt a problem.  If at Central Station, take the 24 tram to Marie Hagenplein (sorry it isn‚Äôt on my tram app) or take 16 tram to Albert Cuypstraat and ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: I felt like in heaven ! Omg amazing food THANK YOU !!!!!!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The staff is very friendly and the service was superb. However, the food was good but not stunning and the restaurant is heavily overpriced (28,50‚Ç¨ per person for all you can eat). ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Authentic Korean BBQ and great service in de pijp. Lekker food and the best part is it's all you can eat!! Highly recommended in Amsterdam. A hidden jewel as I'm a huge foodie!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Perfect place if you're in the mood for Korean BBQ. The option 'unlimited' gives you 5 rounds which are enough to eat your heart out. Food and choice are good though not top level.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: We called them at 3 PM when they opened to make a reservation. The woman told us to come ‚Äúat 5 till 7.‚Äù What does that mean? It means 18:55. We thought it was odd but whatever. We arrive at 18:45 and the same woman refused to seat us ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Reservation was fine and we get our table on time.
But the quality wasn't  as expected for 30 ‚Ç¨ ...
Meat was not seasoned. Sushi was okay. The standard dishes are very small. I ate several times Korean bbq but this was not good...

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Miss Korea is an all-you-can-eat Korean BBQ place with a selection of meats, fish en vegetables that you can prepare on your own on a table BBQ. They also have some sushi, soups and salads. I tried the beef and vegetable stew, which was ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Nice place with good menu options found it is close to sumo branches

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: My first experience of a DIY Korean bbq, but it was really tasty food, helpful staff, and delicious ice-cream too! Try not to over-order as you will be charged for what you don't eat, and they view it as rude, which is fair! I wouldn't ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great food, great atmosphere, extremely friendly staff

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The food was good, service and atmosphere were also nice. That's about all I have to say. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The food was OK, some bits better than others (we enjoyed the pancake, the soup and a potato, seafood and veggies dish with a bitter sweet and sour sauce). The rest was OK but nothing to have your mind blown, so I would give three stars to ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great food, but felt hurried as they kept coming and told us the kitchen would close and that we needed to order more quickly. The staff were not attentive other than telling us to hurry. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Good food and service. We loved the setting anf it's not hard to find

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Friendly staff, food arrived fast every time and we never had to ask for drinks as they were offered to us as soon as our glasses were empty.
Food is, for its price, very good. Paying ‚Ç¨1 or ‚Ç¨2 extra for some things is ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Awesome food and service, need more I do not.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The renovated Miss Korea restaurant is fantastic and now has suction funnels to precent your clothes from smelling. One of the nicest places to go for a gezellig dinner with friends or colleagues.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Food was kinda meh, but the people were very nice

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: If you are looking for authentic Korean food (they have much more than bbq meat), come here. Reservations in advance are highly recommended, as Miss Korea is usually quite busy. Staff serves a lot of plates, so might seem rushed, but are ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: This was so fun. Get reservations. The concept is great and the way you order is cool. My wife and kids were very wary but afterwards kept talking about how much they loved it.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Even as a vegetarian, they have a very good selection for their 5 course -15 item menu. Good luck on getting to even the 4th round if you're a meat eater; my buddies could barely walk afterwards. ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Came with 4 friends, nice looking restaurant, perhaps a bit dull eventho there is korean tv. Good dishes, friendly staff, nice restaurant. Bit of a shame they serve sushi instead of kimbap, but then again the dishes lack a bit of ‚Ä¶

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The food is nice. Good flavors, service is what you can expect in an all-you-can-eat type of restaurant. I will be returning again.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: It was really nice food and atmosphere! Merci beacoup!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The service became worse, leaving us with bad impression. Food is okayish also. I used to like to visit but not anymore after tonight's visit. Better to train the staffs since restaurant is not only about food but also service quality.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Food was delicious until we got lamb in bad stated and smelly. So bad experience. They wanted to include the bad meat in the bill! after they did not try to solve the problem.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Very nice for Korean barbecue, but not my favorite sushi for sure. The waiters were very nice and fun, the service is very nice!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Enjoyed eating at this all you can eat bbq restaurant. Great food, fast service. There are not many bbq all you can eat restaurants in town. That's why it's very popular.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Really good food and extremely nice, polite & funny personel

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Not great and not really alk you can eat. They also make you get a drink no matter what as if 30‚Ç¨ per person already wasn't enough and they get in your ass the whole dinner time to ask if you want more drinks. Had to go drink tap water from bathroom sink and I'm very proud to say it.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The food is nice and quick service.  Had buffet there, and turned out need to book a table. Luckily for us there's an empty table

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Pretty good value for money all you can eat korean bbq place in town. However the ventilation inside is really bad, be ready to smell like smoked BBQ pork after your dinner there.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: I'm korean and for me it was as good as the restaurants in Korea. The Kimchi here was really authentic and it tasted exactly like traditional Korean Kimchi. Most of all, it's all you can eat, so you can try lots of different Korean food.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: First time trying a Korean BBQ and it was definitely worth the price. Would recommend booking a table. Could of easily spent 4 hours in here

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Made for foreigners, made by foreigners. Would never visit again

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Delicious food, a carnivore's dream! Portions are pretty big, so don't order too much too early. Very friendly and capable staff

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Good value BBQ, but portions were very different. When they charge a fee if you leave food they should be consistent or clear about portion sizes.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Good but a bit expensive.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Very fast service and decent quality meat for an all you can eat place. But not an authentic korean bbq. Still 4 stars.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Good food. Fast and friendly staff. Worth the price but not cheap.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Very tasty food, quick service, nice staff, a bit expensive but that's normal for a korean bbq. Just pay attention to the fact that you'll smell like a walking korean bbq after going there!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: The place is located in the Albert Cuyp str. You can grill your own meat at the built in table. Friendly staff and reasonable price for an all you can eat concept.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Food was amazing! Really liked the way they ensure food is not wasted. The rice wine is a must try.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: I never come back this restaurant...sorry but too bad foods. i went to koreanbbq shop a lot of times,so i know good taste. i don't wont to say bad things.......but i felt too bad,every dishes were not delicious.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great place to experience the korean bbq tradion! All you can eat! The portions are quite big so dont order too much at the same time.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great choice of food, and I really love almost all that is on the menu. Great if you want to eat unlimited 'snacks' of Korean food, good for a birthday and a special date

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Fun place for a table bbq with friends!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: I'm promoting my rating as the it's all you can eat and they do big pitchers of beer! Plus the food is decent enough!

Name: Miss Korea BBQ

-The food was good

Name: Miss Korea BBQ

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Very Nice And delicious BBQ.. the staff is Amazing.  Thank you for your kindness.  I recommend like 10000%

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: I love the food here! only the portions are getting smaller and smaller. But the price is still very reasonable price.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Great place for korean bbq! Lots of choice and delicious flavors. Don't forget to bring some clothes that you can throw in the washing machine after

Name: Miss Korea BBQ

Name: Miss Korea BBQ

Name: Miss Korea BBQ

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text:
Great food and Team.

Name: Miss Korea BBQ

Name: Miss Korea BBQ

Name: Miss Korea BBQ
Review Text: Good food and service. We loved the setting anf it's not hard to find
